channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Cook Little Cook
channel.desc: Maisie the Mechanic. The cafe is noisy because the cupboards are creaking and Small's scooter is squeaking.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Moving Waffle. Preschool comedy drama series. Waffle is not allowed to go on a family camping trip but accidentally goes on a different adventure.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild
channel.desc: Honeybee and Naked Mole Rat. Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals and reveal a surprising connection between them in the wild. This time, it's honeybees and naked mole rats.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Daytime Sleepover. Oona and Baba have a daytime sleepover with the Hoots.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Nick Cope's Popcast
channel.desc: Hedgehog Picnic. Can Hugh save the day with his litter picking song and get the hedgehog picnic back on track? The Popcast Planners think so.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Postman Pat
channel.desc: Fruit Bats. Children's animation. Pat is tasked with delivering a family of hibernating fruit bats to Amy. When the bats accidentally escape, he must find a way to rescue them.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: My Fair Pancake. When the Emperor Penguin visits the berg, he discovers Pancake is a long-lost prince. Pancake learns how to act royal, but all the attention goes to his head.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Can't Stop Dancing. When Odd Sock Tyler needs to replace his missing dance crew, Andy and the band put their best feet forward, with some help from Cousin Mac's Super Sneakers.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Justin's House
channel.desc: The Pirates of Justin Town. Justin is hoping to play the part of a pirate captain in a brand new musical, but he has to compete with an actual pirate for the role.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Colourblocks
channel.desc: Yellow Meets Red and Blue. Red and Blue meet Yellow and have fun colouring the seaside. Discover the colours around you.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Magic Hands
channel.desc: A Song About Myself. Children's sign language poetry series. Aimee and Ashley discover To Autumn and A Song About Myself, both by John Keats.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Love Monster
channel.desc: Fluffytown Swap Day. Love Monster has a clear-out for a bring-and-swap event but can't let his old things go.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: A Clean Getaway. Supertato and Tomato find themselves stuck in a slippery bathtub, whilst Evil Pea rampages around the supermarket on a giant soap-squirting machine.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Tickle Crabs. When Dad brings a pair of tenacious tickle crabs home from the beach, nowhere in the house is safe! His only hope of escaping their tickles is with the help of his true love.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: The Lesson. D.O.R.I.S. gives Cosima and Big Lizard a lesson on friction - just in time to help Dad.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Nikhil & Jay
channel.desc: Nikhil and Jay and the Missing Appalams . Nikhil and Jay are detectives today. When the homemade appalams go missing under their watch, they need to solve the case and save lunch.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Go on Holiday. JoJo and Gran Gran play 'holidays' in the park and have a stay-at-home adventure.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: The Puffin Way. Oona learns a crucial puffin skill from Papa.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Sarah & Duck
channel.desc: The Art of Pink. Animation. The art gallery is holding a celebration of the colour pink. Sarah is keen to take part.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Charlie and Lola
channel.desc: It Wasn't Me! Animation in which a pair of siblings deal with everyday topics. Lola's imaginary friend persuades her to borrow Charlie's rocket to take an elephant to the jungle.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Holes. Stop-motion animation. Tiny and Small find a box that has fallen from space. It contains two circles of black cloth that are actually holes, one leading to another.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: BeddyByes
channel.desc: Wheels. MeMo and BaBa have fun playing with cars and discovering the joy of motion. MeMo loves making the wheels go round, while BaBa loves to be pushed along.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Long-Distance Ball Game. In a magical forest, colourful characters have adventures. Daisy and Igglepiggle find the ball in the garden, and soon everyone is kicking it to each other.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Gok Wan - My Daddies. Join Gok Wan for a celebratory story about one lucky girl and her two delightful daddies.
